name: AllureGenerateTask
description: Used to upload the Allure HTML Report to Azure DevOps
author: Jayden Maalouf

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Configuration directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory containing the Allure report output. The default value is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)

inputs.label: Publish Test Results
inputs.helpMarkDown: Publish Allure Test results to Azure DevOps
